channel.title: Blackmesa.7z-Download issues
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I've problems with the download of blackmesa.7z (Yes, I tried on ALL mirrors), because when i have downloaded it 7-zip just say "C:\\Downloads\blackmesa.7z can't be opened as an archive." (I had to translate it because my 7-zip is german) And I don't want to download the file again from all mirrors, because my internet is very slow. Can someone help me? (Yeah, my english is also bad.)
P.S: Can I download the archive in Parts? My Computer needs for the complete data more than 10 hours (because my internet = slow) And this is very annoying when I have to wait untill it's finished...:'(
